item.title: Twitter trees
item.description: A little over a week ago, Hilary Parker tweeted out a poll about sending calendar invites that generated quite the repartee. Do you like getting google calendar invites from your friends for lunches / coffees / etc.? â€” Hilary Parker (@hspter) July 19, 2017 It was quite popular ðŸ’… â€“ so much so that I couldnâ€™t possible keep up with all of the replies!
